conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
It seems you have a taste for movies with robotic elements! I'd like to recommend two films that might interest you.

Firstly, "I, Robot" (1950), featuring Alan Tudyk, James Cromwell, and the iconic Will Smith, is a thriller where a technophobic cop investigates a crime involving a robot, leading to a larger threat to humanity.

If you're looking for something more contemporary, I also suggest "Looper" (2012) starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Bruce Willis. In this film, a hired gun in 2074 waits for targets sent from the future until his own future self is sent back to be eliminated, creating an intriguing loop of time travel and action! Enjoy the movies!
